name: facets
description: In the NSIDC Search and Arctic Data Explorer interfaces, this endpoint is used in conjunction with /OpenSearch whenever a user submits a new search. Consequently, it has the same parameters as /OpenSearch.

searchTerms.description: URL-encoded keyword or keywords desired by the client; OpenSearch 1.1

count.description: The number of search results per page desired by the client; OpenSearch 1.1

startIndex.description: First search result desired by the search client; OpenSearch 1.1

spatial.description: 4 comma separated values - W, S, E, N; OpenSearch-Geo 1.0, "box" parameter

sortKeys.description: Sort the results by most relevant (default), smallest or largest spatial area, shortest or longest temporal duration, or most recently updated; partial implementation of OpenSearch SRU 1.0

startDate.description: The start date in yyyy-mm-dd format

endDate.description: The end date in yyyy-mm-dd format

facetFilters.description: Describes faceted restrictions on the search. A URL-encoded JSON object where the keys are the names of the facet, and the values are arrays of the selected facet values

source.description: Custom parameter for selecting which source to use; the Arctic Data Explorer (ADE) uses data aggregated from many sources, including, but not limited to, NSIDC
